summary: A runaway teenager and a mixed-race horse breeder strike an unlikely friendship in the context of common hardships.
cast: Charles Bronson|Jill Ireland|Marcel Bozzuffi|Vincent Van Patten|Fausto Tozzi|Ettore Manni|Melissa Chimenti|Corrado Gaipa|José Nieto|Diana Lorys|Conchita Muñoz|Florencio Amarilla|Bruno Boschetti|Annamaria Clementi|Rafael García|Luis Prendes|Luis Rico|Ricardo Rodríguez|Adolfo Thous|Juan Manuel Torres|Henri Vidon
title: Caballos salvajes
